MSN Spaces weblog community is up and running

Posted by raymondlewallen on December 2, 2004

MSN Spaces has launched. I set my blog up very quickly, and they have over 31 custom templates to choose a layout from. I use FireFox, and it tells me that if I were using IE, there are “richer” settings I can choose from.

One thing I don’t see, something I really like about blogger.com, is that I can’t find an option to “delete forver” my blog on msn. (Don’ t you love that delete forever button in your gmail ).

All you need is a passport account and you are ready to go. Get in quick, as the names for spaces will disappear quickly.
